name: web_exchange_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool open_defi.
Tool description: Open DeFi API gives you access to decentralised exchange trading data, liquidity and tokens across multiple blockchains.
API description: Fetches detailed information about a specific exchange on a given blockchain using the RapidAPI Open DeFi endpoint.

exchange_slug.description: The slug representing the exchange, e.g., 'sushiswap'.

chain_slug.description: The slug representing the blockchain, e.g., 'ethereum'.
